I loooove these! I bought a size small, my normal size, and I’m 5’2. The material is smooth and stiff (in a good way)—no wrinkling after washing and they have pockets! The waistband is comfortable, not too tight. I have two other pairs of fashion boxers from dressedinlala that are way more expensive, and these feel just like them! And I love that the black and white stripes design goes well with anything.

These are so cute! I am 5’10. 155 lbs. I got these in size large. True to size fit! I love the high waisted fit. Easy to dress up or down. Not see through and very comfy!
Super cute for casual wear
Don’t buy. Material is uncomfortable

These shorts were a love hate find. The color I chose (white) was obviously see through, but being cautious about what to wear underneath didn’t phase me. What it came down to was the overall fit. The medium was almost too small, while the large was way too big. After settling for the medium, I found that the shorts were tight around my thighs when I would sit down and “puffed” out around the tummy area. It was very unflattering and uncomfortable. The print was cute and the pockets were a nice touch, but the overall quality wasn’t the best.
I liked the fit and cut of the shorts but the material was too papery. It made it look like cheap pajama shorts.
These are a great length for lounge-y boxer shorts. Fit as expected and feels like a good quality (normal boxer material). Think enough you can see through (I have green pair).
Cute and good quality, definitely size up a size or two

Perfect for the summer. Not transparent and quite comfortable. The length is perfect and the fabric is nice. I love the color

So cute
Cute and really nice fit!

Fit is fine. Ordered a large to make sure the legs wouldn’t be too tight. But there’s inconsistency in other review photos and mine. Namely the tag. Different writing on some and my tag is upside down. Not stressing it but nothing screams Amazon like upside down print.

I love these shorts so much that I’m buying two more pairs! I have a 29inch waist and the medium fit me perfectly. Not too tight and not too baggy. The most comfortable lounge short. They are also thick enough and long enough to wear outside the house too.

评论概述: Wouldn’t necessarily say I’ll buy this item
评论详情: Honestly, I’ll give this a 4/5 star only because I didn’t really like how it looked on me. I felt like even though, it  wasn’t tight fitting on, I wanted it to be a little more baggy. But I don’t wear these to bed, I wear these boxers out as a fashion piece.
Very nice

While I like the style of these shorts, I'm definitely not a fan of the fabric. It's a cheap, thin, starchy polyester that feels inflexible and a little rough. If the fabric was of a better quality, I think these would be great for lounging and wearing during the summer, but they also look a lot like men's boxers. Especially with the brand tag right in the front in the middle of the waistband, they look like men's underwear and not like shorts for wearing out in public. I like the color, pattern and that they have pockets, but the overall quality really isn't very good. I'm honestly pretty disappointed with these shorts since I thought they looked like comfortable, casual bottoms and they're not. I would not recommend.

I'm typically a M but ordered L hoping they'd be a little baggy. They fit just right, which is also fine. But definitely size up one if you want them to fit, and size up two if you want them a little big.
Obsessed with these boxer shorts - such a great price and fit!
a little see through but they are so comfy and cute

Great short for the summer, fit the size and very comfortable. Definitely worth the price.
